publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1173 Maureen Macmillan: Prostate Cancer Awareness Week—That the Parliament notes that 11 to 16 September 2000 is Prostate Cancer Awareness Week and recognises the important contribution made by voluntary groups who seek to make people aware of the dangers of prostate cancer.
S1M-1173 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Shona Robison*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-1173 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2000) Trish Godman*

S1M-1173 Maureen Macmillan: Prostate Cancer Awareness Week-That the Parliament notes that 11 to 16 September 2000 is Prostate Cancer Awareness Week and recognises the important contribution made by voluntary groups who seek to make people aware of the dangers of prostate cancer. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Linda Fabiani, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Trish Godman, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1173 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1173 Prostate Cancer Awareness Week (lodged on 12 September 2000) David Mundell*, Michael Russell*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-1173 Maureen Macmillan: Prostate Cancer Awareness Week—That the Parliament notes that 11 to 16 September 2000 is Prostate Cancer Awareness Week and recognises the important contribution made by voluntary groups who seek to make people aware of the dangers of prostate cancer.
